page.title: 16THE PRESENT POPULATION.
page.content:
ANALYSIS OF FINDINGS. Following our survey,we reached the following conclusions:
1. There were less 21-30 year-olds than 0-10,11-20 and 31-40 year-olds in the village because the people in this age-group were just starting out on their careers,and neither required nor could afford the kind of housing which Haslingfield offered.
2. There were more 41-50 year-olds than 51-60 and 61-70 year-olds because this age-group is at the peak of its earning power,and can afford Haslingfield house prices.
(Continued).
